alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Houghton and southwestern Baraga Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sidnaw, or 19 miles southwest of L`anse, moving northeast at 35 mph. Other strong storms were located near Trout Creek and south of Alston. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Kenton, Alberta, Sidnaw, Canyon Falls, Herman and Watton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
